why does roughgarden not show properly in /tasks
data.approach: Investigating the rendering pipeline for RoughGarden in /tasks - checking how agentTasks map is built from API data

data.taskTitle: why does roughgarden not show properly in /tasks
summary: Diagnosed: RoughGarden had a tmux session but no task assigned (used for planning only)
Sessions without tasks appeared in Active Tasks section with sparse/broken display
Fix: Filter out taskless sessions from sessionsByProject() in /tasks page
Sessions only appear when they have a task (active or recently completed)

data.taskTitle: why does roughgarden not show properly in /tasks
summary: Diagnosed: RoughGarden had a tmux session but no task - showed as idle with sparse display
planning state already existed in statusColors.ts (indigo badge, chat icon, Convert to Tasks action)
Fix: Sessions without tasks now show as PLANNING instead of IDLE on /tasks and /sessions
Text updated from No active task to Planning session for planning-state sessions

data.taskTitle: Fix planning session row formatting in /tasks
summary: Replaced loose project-badge + avatar + agent-name with a planning pill that mirrors the TaskIdBadge agentPill aesthetic
Planning pill uses indigo (oklch hue 270) color-mix background/border matching the planning state theme
Column 2 now shows properly-sized Planning session title (0.9375rem) with description instead of small italic text
Added planning-pill, planning-project-tag, planning-title, planning-description CSS classes

suggestedTasks.title: Debug Task Rendering Component for Specific Task Visibility
suggestedTasks.description: Investigate why roughgarden task is not displaying correctly in /tasks view. Examine the task list rendering logic, data fetching mechanism, and potential filtering issues. Check if there are any inconsistencies in task metadata or display conditions that might suppress this specific task.
suggestedTasks.reason: Task visibility issue discovered during investigation

documentationNeeds: Update troubleshooting guide for task list rendering
